lead_paragraph: The explosion occurred outside a courthouse and security headquarters operated by the opposition fighters who control the town, Azaz, along the Turkish border.
snippet: The explosion occurred outside a courthouse and security headquarters operated by the opposition fighters who control the town, Azaz, along the Turkish border....

headline.main: Truck Bomb in Rebel-Held Syrian Town Kills Dozens
headline.print_headline: Truck Bomb in Rebel-Held Syrian Town Kills Dozens
